Name: Voltaic Band
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Ground-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Elekid, Electabuzz, and Electivire.  You can get a Voltaic Band at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Electi-Claw, an Electi-Card, and a Voltaic Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
